item.title: Amazon Echo Show Web Browser
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: The Amazon Echo Show has a hidden web browser, and here is how you can enable it. Keep in mind that the Amazon Echo Show is running Android at its core. Therefore, like any normal Android web browser, you have access to the same WebKit features and vulnerabilities when using the browser. Enable Amazon Echo Show Web Browser Go into your settings and go to Legal and Compliance. Then go intoÂ Amazon Privacy Notice.
